verses.verse: God <WH430> spoke <WH1696> all these words, <WH1697> saying, <WH559>
"I am Yahweh <WH3068> your God, <WH430> who brought <WH3318> you out of the land <WH776> of Egypt, <WH4714> out of the house <WH1004> of bondage. <WH5650>
"You shall have no other <WH312> gods <WH430> before me. <WH6440>

"You shall not make <WH6213> for yourselves an idol, <WH6459> nor any image of anything that <WH834> is in the heavens <WH8064> above, <WH4605> or that <WH834> is in the earth <WH776> beneath, <WH4325> or that is in the water under the earth: <WH776>

you shall not bow yourself down <WH7812> to them, <WH5647> nor serve them, <WH3068> for I, Yahweh your God, <WH430> am a jealous <WH7067> God, <WH430> visiting <WH6485> the iniquity <WH5771> of the fathers <WH1> on the children, <WH1121> on the third <WH8029> and on the fourth <WH7256> generation of those who hate me, <WH8130>
and showing <WH6213> loving kindness <WH2617> to thousands <WH505> of those who love <WH157> me and keep <WH8104> my commandments. <WH4687>

"You shall not take <WH5375> the name <WH8034> of Yahweh <WH3068> your God <WH430> in vain, <WH7723> for Yahweh <WH3068> will not hold him guiltless <WH5352> who takes <WH5375> his name <WH8034> in vain. <WH7723>
"Remember <WH2142> the Sabbath <WH7676> day, <WH3117> to keep it holy. <WH6942>
You shall labor <WH5647> six <WH8337> days, <WH3117> and do <WH6213> all your work, <WH4399>

but the seventh <WH7637> day <WH3117> is a Sabbath <WH7676> to Yahweh <WH3068> your God. <WH430> You shall not do <WH6213> any work <WH4399> in it, <WH1121> you, nor your son, nor your daughter, <WH1323> your male servant, <WH5650> nor your female servant, <WH519> nor your livestock, <WH929> nor your stranger <WH1616> who is within your gates; <WH8179>

for in six <WH8337> days <WH3117> Yahweh <WH3068> made <WH6213> heaven <WH8064> and earth, <WH776> the sea, <WH3220> and all that is in them, <WH5117> and rested the seventh <WH7637> day; <WH3117> therefore Yahweh <WH3068> blessed <WH1288> the Sabbath <WH7676> day, <WH3117> and made it holy. <WH6942>
"Honor <WH3513> your father <WH1> and your mother, <WH517> that your days <WH3117> may be long <WH748> in the land <WH127> which Yahweh <WH3068> your God <WH430> gives you. <WH5414>
"You shall not murder. <WH7523>
"You shall not commit adultery. <WH5003>
"You shall not steal. <WH1589>
"You shall not give <WH6030> false <WH8267> testimony <WH5707> against your neighbor. <WH7453>

"You shall not covet <WH2530> your neighbor <WH7453>'s house. <WH1004> You shall not covet <WH2530> your neighbor <WH7453>'s wife, <WH802> nor his male servant, <WH5650> nor his female servant, <WH519> nor his ox, <WH7794> nor his donkey, <WH2543> nor anything that is your neighbor <WH7453>'s."

All the people <WH5971> perceived <WH7200> the thunderings, <WH6963> the lightnings, <WH3940> the sound <WH6963> of the trumpet, <WH7782> and the mountain <WH2022> smoking. <WH6226> When the people <WH5971> saw <WH7200> it, <WH5128> they trembled, and stayed <WH5975> at a distance. <WH7350>
They said <WH559> to Moses, <WH4872> "Speak <WH1696> with us yourself, <WH8085> and we will listen; but don't <WH430> let God speak <WH1696> with us, <WH4191> lest we die."

Moses <WH4872> said <WH559> to the people, <WH5971> "Don't <WH3372> be afraid, for God <WH430> has come <WH935> to <WH5668> test <WH5254> you, <WH3374> and that his fear may be before you, <WH6440> that you won't <WH2398> sin."
The people <WH5971> stayed <WH5975> at a distance, <WH7350> and Moses <WH4872> drew near <WH5066> to the thick darkness <WH6205> where God was. <WH430>

Yahweh <WH3068> said <WH559> to Moses, <WH4872> "This is what you shall tell <WH559> the children <WH1121> of Israel: <WH3478> <WH7200> 'You yourselves have seen that I have talked <WH1696> with you from heaven. <WH8064>
You shall most certainly not make <WH6213> alongside of me gods <WH430> of silver, <WH3701> or gods <WH430> of gold <WH2091> for yourselves. <WH6213>

You shall make <WH6213> an altar <WH4196> of earth <WH127> for me, <WH2076> and shall sacrifice on it your burnt offerings <WH5930> and your peace offerings, <WH5930> your sheep <WH6629> and your cattle. <WH1241> In every place <WH4725> where I record <WH2142> my name <WH8034> I will come <WH935> to you and I will bless you. <WH1288>
If you make <WH6213> me an altar <WH4196> of stone, <WH68> you shall not build <WH1129> it of cut stones; <WH68> for if you lift up <WH5130> your tool <WH2719> on it, <WH2490> you have polluted it.
Neither shall you go up <WH5927> by steps <WH4609> to my altar, <WH4196> that your nakedness <WH6172> may not be exposed to it. <WH1540>'
